title: Two selfish assholes

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Steal someone’s ability, as every good thing should only happen to you.
- Put someone down at night, granting you Powerful defense for the night and roleblocking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may use two abilities each night. You may use the same ability twice.
- You have two Overprotective autovests.
- You can’t take abilities that copy other abilities, or kill, because you’re narcissists, not murderers.
- If a person only has the ability to kill, learn their role instead. Cannot be fooled by frames hexes douses and other sorts of investigative changes.
- The town will receive an announcement on Day 2.5 (12 hours after Day 2 starts, or the end of Day 2, whichever comes first) that “Two fucktards are shouting that they're the kings”
- On Day 2.5 you will receive death immunity.
- Town has 1.5 days to win before your egos grow too much, allowing you to overpower anyone with your pointless stories about how great you are.
- The only way for you to lose is if at least 1.5 town members visit you.
- All evils will be notified of who you are, and if you die all of them lose and die because they’re your homies who put you up.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make town lose because they hate you even though you did *nothing* wrong

desc:
Post 3053
*Hey, my name's Kyle, and his name's Richard, and we're narcissistic pieces of shit.*
